title: WTB: Obak horizontals and Victoria players...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: WTB: Obak horizontals and Victoria players...
posts.post_content:
Good Evening,

I am in search of Obak horizontals or players from the Victoria team set.  I have a number of Victoria players however I am looking to upgrade a few and also acquire the key card of the subset, Ten Million.  I am interested in graded and raw copies.

Please send me a PM should you have any of the above mentioned available.  Thanks.  :)
I have a really nice looking Martinke I could part with.  Do you still need him?
Pm sent on a t212 brackenridge.
